item.title: Storybook
item.description: When I develop new web components I find it frustrating that I have to run the app, click it through until the point I find my new visual, just to see how it behaves in a real life situation. Unit tests are great to check whether my component does what I intended, but styling is a whole different story. I’ve been looking for a component preview library for React, that is not invasive and I do not need to change my code with extra markup to make it work, Storybook does exactly what I was looking for.
